title.narrative: EMERGENCY SUPPORT FOR HUMANITARIAN ACTIO

description.narrative: Timely, effective and reliable support to country offices for humanitarian action, which contributes to Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: WCAR country programmes contribute to achieving the Strategic Plan 2014-2017 key results for children through application of country appropriate strategies - in development and humanitarian contexts

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Timely, effective and reliable support to country offices for humanitarian action

description.narrative: In 2017, WCARO emergency supported COs to strengthen response in DRC, CAR, Nigeria and Sierra Leone. Since 2014, we maintained capacity to respond to chronic/sudden onset emergencies. WCARO team provided support including emergency preparedness and response training, field monitoring (HPM and IM), coordination, humanitarian advocacy, RRM and resource mobilization. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/12/2017
